column5: Beautiful home on salt lake for relaxing and enjoying family time. Two bedroom one bath upstairs and one bedroom one bath downstairs with private access to backyard and hot tub. Imagine lounging in the hot tub enjoying a glass of wine enjoying the breeze and the water view! Take the kayak out to nearby islands to enjoy wade fishing where the guides take their customers, or just to enjoy birdwatching. Loads of parking for 6 vehicles, extra room for boat trailer.
